_hero_title_1: Creating the Future of Jewelry in 3D
_hero_desc_1: We bring your ideas to life in both the digital and physical worlds.
_hero_desc_2: From a sketch to a finished 3D model, perfectly matching your vision.
_hero_desc_3: Photorealistic renders that will showcase your future piece in all its glory.
_about_us_title: Combining Jewelry Artistry with Digital Technology
_about_us_desc: We are a team of artisans who have united classic jewelry art with the cutting-edge technologies of 3D modeling. Our mission is to create unique jewelry that reflects the individuality of each client. Using modern design methods, we transform your ideas into exclusive masterpieces, available in both digital and physical form.
_order_title: From idea to a production-ready file — a transparent and clear process
_order_step_desc_1: You provide us with a sketch, photo, or description of the future piece, specifying dimensions, number and parameters of any gems, and the desired weight in the required metal standard.
_order_step_desc_2: During the modeling process, we coordinate all elements with you step-by-step. At the final stage, you receive photorealistic renders from the required angles for your approval.
_order_step_desc_3: After your final approval, we send you the production-ready .STL file, perfectly suited for 3D printing or milling.
_services_title: We turn your ideas into reality with cutting-edge 3D technologies
_services_desc_1: Creation of high-precision and detailed 3D models of jewelry based on your sketches, photos, or ideas.
_services_desc_2: Photorealistic renders of your future jewelry, ideal for catalogs, presentations, and social media.
_services_desc_3: We help develop your initial idea into a complete, production-ready concept for a piece of jewelry.
_contact_subtitle: Have an idea? Write to us, and we will bring it to life.
_contact_info_subtitle: We are always ready to discuss your ideas and projects. Contact us in any convenient way.
_contact_message_placeholder: Describe your idea or ask a question...
_contact_success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We will contact you soon.
_contact_error_message: An error occurred while sending. Please try again.
_contact_validation_message_length: The message must be at least 10 characters long.
_portfolio_subtitle: Examples of our work, brought to life in 3D
_footer_description: Creating the future of jewelry with cutting-edge 3D technologies.
